title: HNP eSports Seeking Diamond+ Top & Support
body:
We are seeking a diamond+ to work with the team and prepare for next split as well as the last of this split. 

Positions: Top Support
Requirements:
- 16+
- Working Mic
- Available to train weekly and compete in tournaments bi-weekly
- Friendly but serious nature
- Diamond 5+

I'm the manager for the team so add me in game: Hnp dawg

EDIT: TOP is a priority, if you can top and free 21/07 8pm AEST pm we have a scrim for you to be apart of.
